response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its unique features and benefits tailored specifically to meet your needs, I propose an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents an exceptional opportunity to secure such a high-value asset at a competitive rate. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the transaction promptly.", "product_price": 1200000}
